mapper.select: SELECT U.UR_DATE, U.UR_START_TIME, U.UR_END_TIME, S.SR_SERVER_NAME, P.PET_NAME, P.PET_KIND, P.PET_AGE, P.PET_GENDER, P.PET_WEIGHT, P.PET_SIGN, U.UR_REQUIRE, S.SR_PRICE, U.UR_CHECK FROM SERVICE_REGIST s JOIN USER_REGIST u ON s.SR_ID = u.SR_ID JOIN PET p ON u.UR_PET_ID = p.PET_ID WHERE UR_ID = #{urId} AND s.SR_CATEGORY = 'S'
